text: Death to America (Arabic: الموت لأمريكا) is a anti-American slogan. The slogan is most commonly used in Afghanistan, Lebanon, Yemen, Iraq, Pakistan, Iran,Arash Karami: Khomeini Orders Media to End 'Death to America' Chant , Iran Pulse, October 13, 2013 and Palestine. The slogan was created by Iran out of anger to the U.S. government and Iranian officials have cleared up that they do not want to kill normal citizens of America. == References == Category:Anti-Americanism Category:Political slogans
title: Death to America
